name: Saiba
description:
=WARNING=

Little bug: When in the "Sensei Room" the "A" touch only work when you zigzag up and down or if you press "Q" at the same time 

Sorry for the inconvenience it's due to the fact I'm using an AZERTY keyboard 

This game is Jam game for GMTK.

Made by PixelStuff, composed with Hugo Demont, Starter45 and Otaku_1

You play as a hacker who is contacted by a rather strange gentleman who will guide you in a very dangerous quest to be the best.
This game is made with GameMaker studio 2 and PyxelEdit.
The theme of this jam is Roll of the Dice, so we decided to make a adventure game where all combat is based on lucky. (but is always possible to win)

With your luck and your capacity to choose the good thing and kill all the enemies, progress in the game.

WARNIG: THERE MIGHT BE A FEW BUG... 48H IS A BIT SHORT FOR PLAY TESTING
